Class com.devandrepascoa.data_structure.Person

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.devandrepascoa.data_structure.Point
      • com.devandrepascoa.data_structure.Person

  • public class com.devandrepascoa.data_structure.Person
extends com.devandrepascoa.data_structure.Point
    The com.devandrepascoa.data_structure.Person class provides the pillar for the whole program, it will be the data structure for plotting the pandemic graph due to it's infectedPeople attribute
